a nation of immigrants stands united.
In Trump's America, how great are you?

paragraphs.name: 7ff8
paragraphs.text: Trump: Ugh, oozing sores, someone get me a trash can, I think I’m going to puke. (President Trump is heard on the audiotape retching into a receptacle of some kind, then asks for a glass of water and resumes.) Okay, Steve, this is getting disgusting. I’ve talked to you before about those skin boils and abscesses. Either you see a dermatologist next week or you’re out. Got that? I’m also going to suggest that you see a shrink. Your inner rage is boiling to the surface and manifesting as skin lesions. That’s a real thing, I saw it on Oprah. You need to work on your anger issues.

paragraphs.text: Now that it has come to light that fashion designer Ivanka was the one calling the shots when the U. S. attacked Syria, I hope Trumpy’s pinhead children are the first to go to war when it starts. Otherwise, Trumpy had better stop trash-talking every leader and learn something about foreign policy.

fc8004736194.title: Latest criteria for the US to intervene overseas.

paragraphs.text: Latest criteria for the US to intervene overseas.
paragraphs.name: 638b

paragraphs.text: Does the incident involve beautiful babies? No ugly kids they don't get the exposure on the news.
Did the incident make Ivanka cry?
paragraphs.name: f839

paragraphs.text: Only if both criteria met will we launch the missiles.*
(*Subject to change depending on DT’s mood.)

1610e9a4a64f.title: I did! It was everything I’d hoped.

paragraphs.text: I did! It was everything I’d hoped. And we all needed that. Satire and irreverence is basically the only thing getting me through this Brave New World. Thanks for the good work.
paragraphs.name: de54

ccc60a586185.title: Please please (pretty please with sugar on it) tell us this is all real.

paragraphs.text: Please please (pretty please with sugar on it) tell us this is all real.
paragraphs.name: ed6f

paragraphs.text: If it turns out to be satire I’m gonna be, like, todally, like, crushed.
(Besides no matter how crap my day might be, laughing out loud at these, ahem, “White House bulletins" restores my equilibrium, even if the others on my train think I’m fit only for the funny farm.)

virtuals.subtitle: If it turns out to be satire I’m gonna be, like, todally, like, crushed.

content.subtitle: If it turns out to be satire I’m gonna be, like, todally, like, crushed.

c93dbd2ed33e.name: Harper Thorpe
